description:
Pod`s Baoppu was first revealed in the Sanyo Gym when Ash was shown the three gym leaders Pokémon and he looked it up in his PokéDex. Baoppu is Pod`s main Pokémon and is relied on for gym battles.
Baoppu battled against Ash`s Pokabu during Ash`s gym battle. Baoppu showed its was a strong opponent but Ash`s tactics proved to be enough to get Pokabu to be able to defeat Baoppu.
name: Baoppu (Pod)
